title: Stock Market Basics
short_description: Learn the fundamentals of the stock market, key terminologies, and how it works.
long_description: This course is perfect for beginners aiming to understand the stock market. You’ll explore how markets function, common investment terms, types of stocks, and how to start your investment journey. Gain clarity on concepts like IPOs, market indices, and risk management strategies.
author: Arjun Patel

title: Technical Analysis for Beginners
short_description: Understand charts, trends, and technical indicators to predict price movements.
long_description: Discover how to analyze stock charts and identify trading opportunities using technical tools like candlesticks, moving averages, RSI, and MACD. This course will help you understand market trends, chart patterns, and strategies for short-term trading success.
author: Atul Jain

title: Fundamental Analysis
short_description: Master the art of analyzing a company's financial health to make informed investment decisions.
long_description: This course covers the detailed evaluation of companies using their financial statements, ratios, and economic indicators. Learn to identify undervalued stocks, analyze balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow reports to build a long-term portfolio.
author: Rohan Malhotra

title: Options and Derivatives Trading
short_description: Understand derivatives like options and futures to hedge risks and maximize profits.
long_description: This course simplifies derivatives trading by breaking down options and futures contracts. Learn about call/put options, strike price, expiry, and how to leverage hedging techniques to manage risks and optimize returns in volatile markets.
author: Vivek Choudhary

title: Intraday Trading Strategies
short_description: Learn strategies for buying and selling stocks within the same day for quick profits.
long_description: Dive into the fast-paced world of intraday trading. Learn essential concepts like stop loss, margin trading, and order execution strategies. This course covers proven techniques to capitalize on daily price fluctuations and manage risks effectively.
author: Ramesh Damani

title: Global Stock Markets
short_description: Learn to diversify your investments by exploring international markets and global assets.
long_description: This course introduces you to global investing, helping you access opportunities beyond domestic markets. Learn about international stocks, ETFs, and indices like the S&P 500, NASDAQ, and Dow Jones.
author: Aditya Verma

title: Value Investing
short_description: Discover how to identify undervalued stocks and invest in businesses for long-term growth.
long_description: Inspired by legends like Warren Buffett and Benjamin Graham, this course teaches the principles of value investing. Learn how to analyze a company's intrinsic value, financial ratios (like P/E and P/B), and future growth potential.
author: Basant Maheshwari

title: IPO Investing
short_description: Understand Initial Public Offerings (IPOs) and learn how to invest in new market listings.
long_description: This course demystifies the IPO process and teaches you how to evaluate companies going public. Learn key metrics like subscription numbers, grey market premiums, and valuations to make informed decisions. Gain insights on identifying IPOs with high growth potential and navigating risks associated with new listings.
author: Manish Agrawal
